feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas to separate clauses and phrases.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 uses formal language and proper grammar, while Text 2 uses informal language and includes profanity.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has a more balanced sentence structure and coherence, while Text 2 is more disjointed and lacks cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 maintains a neutral tone and is more formal, whereas Text 2 has a strong and informal tone with profanity.

feature5.explanation: Both texts are free of spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in formality, coherence, and tone, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is low.
